snippet: The lab, a pioneer in cancer research, is about to embark on a new collaboration between pure science and clinical science with North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System.
abstract: Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory, Long Island institution dedicated to cancer research, is partnering with North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System in effort to bring in human research subjects for clinical trials; hospital system's large, diverse patient base will benefit approach to cancer treatment increasingly focused on individual genetics and cases.
lead_paragraph: The lab, a pioneer in cancer research, is about to embark on a new collaboration between pure science and clinical science with North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System.

headline.main: Cold Spring Harbor Lab, Seeking Human Subjects, Teams Up With Hospital System
headline.print_headline: Research Partnership Will Seek Human Subjects for Cancer Work

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System
